items.name: Swift Stream 2.4GHz 5 Channels 6-Axis Gyro Z-10 Remote Control Drone with Build In 0.3MP 640 x 480 Pixel Wi-Fi Camera, Black
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Record video and take photos flying inside or outside with this versatile drone, which displays footage right on your smartphone. This multifunction drone performs 360-degree flips, flies forward and backward and ascends and descends with ease via an included 2.4GHz transmitter, which is easy to use and read thanks to an LCD display. Install the free app, available for Apple and Android devices, and start snapping still images and streaming video in real-time straight to your smartphone via the drone's built-in WiFi. Equipped with eight built-in LED lights, this drone can fly safely even at night. It also works both indoors and outside, so you can get a bird's-eye view of your house or sneak a peek at your opponent's Scrabble tiles.<br>
items.longDescription: <strong>This product may require registration with the FAA prior to operation. To learn more, please visit <a href="http://www.faa.gov/uas/registration/">www.faa.gov/uas/registration</a></strong>  <br><strong>Swift Stream Z-10 Remote Control 19" Camera Drone:</strong> <br><ul class="noindent"><li>Age Range: 14 years and up</li><li>5-channel control for aerial stunts</li><li>2.4GHz remote control</li><li>WiFi camera included</li><li>Built in LED lights</li><li>Auto-return push-button</li><li>Easy to download app</li><li>Works with all smartphones</li><li>Rechargeable Li Poly battery</li></ul><p><span>For any questions about parts, service, repairs or support please contact:</span><br></p><p><span>866-296-2700</span><br> <br> <br></p>

items.name: Gravity Z Auldey Sky Rover Infrared 3-Channel with Gyro Indoor Helicopter, Red
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: Get airborne with the Gravity Z Auldey Sky Rover Infrared 3-Channel with Gyro Indoor Helicopter. This colorful helicopter has infrared control for indoor use. It has a lithium rechargeable battery, Smart Circuit protection and can fly over six minutes. The remote control helicopter toy controller features a left/right trimmer and infrared controls. Two spare main blades, a spare tail blade, a fastener and a USB cable are included with the toy. Four AAA batteries are required for operation; batteries are sold separately.
items.longDescription: <b>Gravity Z Auldey Sky Rover Infrared 3-Channel with Gyro Indoor Helicopter, Red:<br></b><br><b>Helicopter:</b><br><ul><li>Rise, fall, turn left, turn right, forward, backward, stop</li><li>Flight time: more than 6 minutes</li><li>Control distance: 8 meters</li><li>Lithium rechargeable battery (included)</li><li>With Smart Circuit protection</li><li>USB charging</li></ul><br><b>Controller:</b><br><ul><li>A/B/C bands infrared control</li><li>Left/right trimmer</li><li>Sky rover helicopter, red requires 4 AAA batteries</li><li>Batteries sold separately</li></ul><b>Spare parts:</b> <br><ul><li>2 main blades</li><li>1 tail blade</li><li>1 USB cable</li><li>1 fastener</li></ul>

items.name: Syma S109G 3.5 Channel RC Apache Helicopter with Gyro
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: The Syma S109G is a palm size 3-Channels Helicopter, it has a youngest brother in the Syma Apache line. The S109G has a Co-Axial structure which is specially made for first time flyers. The S109G is built with thick plastic body which always survives in crashes. The Syma S109G is equipped with a 4-in-1 receiver (Gyro, ESC, Mixer, Receiver), allows the helicopter to move in all directions. This hobby helicopter is designed for ages 8+.

W x 2.75 in. H (2.5 lbs.).

items.longDescription: The X119FPV quadcopter comes with a built it camera that lets you stream live video directly to the remote control while the quadcopter is in flight while still being able to record video or take still images for unsurpassed fun. Capture your friends and family from aerial view shots and see the world from a whole new angle. 6 channel function provide stable flying and easy operation that even lets you do 360 degree rotations and tricks. A built in rechargeable battery lets you have non stop fun without having to swap out batteries. USB cable makes charging more convenient so you can charge from any USB port. You can even fly at night with the LEDs that surround the edge of the quadcopter for nighttime fun.<br><br>Features<br>White with gray, gold and black accents<br>6-Channel Remote Control Rotor Quadcopter (11.5-inch design, rotor to rotor)<br>FPV (First Person View) quadcopter - items.name: Air Hogs RC Axis 400x R/C Helicopter- in colors Black/Silver & Black/Orange
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.shortDescription: The Air Hogs RC Helicopter Avis 400x is a fun and fast remote-controlled toy. This chopper includes internal gyro stabilization to maintain level flight and increase control. Dual prop stability keeps the helicopter flying straight even in windy conditions. With four-channel control, you can send eight different directional commands to the rotors for exceptional maneuverability. Perform daring and spectacular stunts to impress your friends. The Air Hogs helicopter features crash-resistant construction and materials to protect it against falls and impacts. The crash protection makes this chopper a fantastic starter model to train beginner pilots. Give this item as a gift to your favorite flight enthusiast.The kit includes a charging cable and storage, two spare tail rotors and an instruction sheet.
items.longDescription: <br><b>Air Hogs RC Axis 400x R/C Helicopter, Black/Silver:</b><ul><li>High-performance RC heli</li><li>Air Hogs helicopter features internal gyro stabilization</li><li>Dual prop stability</li><li>4-channel RC helicopter black/silver (8-directional control)</li><li>Crash-resistant construction and materials</li><li>Includes: 1 Air Hogs Axis 400x indoor RC helicopter, 1 controller with charging cable and storage, 2 spare tail rotors, 1 instruction sheet</li><li>Great model for beginning pilots to learn to fly</li><li>Requires 6 AA batteries (not included)</li></ul>

items.shortDescription: Transport your DJI Phantom 3 or DJI Phantom 3 Professional Quadcopter with style and security. This quality case features a durable and stylish alloy finish, multiple carry handles, lockable latches and collapsible tow handle, with easy glide wheels. The interior of the case impresses with a precut foam insert that securely protects your drone, controller, batteries and accessories from exposure and damage. Protect your new DJI Phantom 3 with this rugged and durable case, or give one as a gift. Have the confidence and peace of mind to securely store and travel with your quadcopter wherever you go. items.name: RC 6 Axis Mini Quadcopter Flying Drone Toy Gyro HD Camera Remote Control LED Lights
items.categoryPath: Toys/Remote Control & Play Vehicles/Remote Control Toys
items.longDescription: Best Choice Products is proud to present this brand new Mini Drone. This adorable little guy is your entrance to a grand world of entertainment. The drone includes 2 batteries to replace one after the first one has run out. The controller requires 4AA batteries (not included) to be able to control the drone. Once the drone is charged, and the controller has batteries, begin your flying journey through the skies! The drone contains 4 different propellers that allow it to ascend, descend, move forward, move in reverse, to the left, and to the right. As the drone ascends, it contains red and blue flashing lights that help identify the location of the drone. The best part of the this mini drone is that it still has the capability to record videos and take pictures in high quality just as any regular drone. Fly high, explore the skies, and gain new perspectives. We purchase our products directly from the manufacturer, so you know you're getting the best prices available. <p><br><br>NEW PRODUCT WITH FACTORY PACKAGING</p><p><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Contains 6 axis gyro that allows the drone to ascend, descend, fly forward, reverse, left, and right and 360 roll over<br></li><li>Equipped with blue and red flashing lights that help identify the drone in the sky<br></li><li>Capable of recording videos and taking pictures (1280x720 Pixels) which are saved in its 2G memory<br></li><li>Drone includes an extra battery for extra fun, as well as 4 additional propellers<br></li><li>Includes controller that maneuvers drone and takes picture/ video, requires 4AA batteries (not included)</li></ul><p><br><br>SPECIFICATIONS:</p><p><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Product Dimensions: 5"(L) x 5"(W) x 1"(H)<br></li><li>Shipping Dimensions: 13.5"(L) x 7"(W) x 3.5"(H)<br></li><li>Weight: 1 lbs.<br></li><li>Shipping Weight: 1.5 lbs</li></ul><p><br><br>PLEASE NOTE:</p><p><br></p><ul class="noindent"><li>Our digital images are as accurate as possible. However, different monitors may cause colors to vary slightly.<br></li><li>Some of our items are handcrafted and/or hand finished. Color can vary and slight imperfections in the metal work are normal and considered evidence of the hand-finishing process, which adds character and authenticity to those items.</li></ul>
